summary: On going project to add several new lush islands to Skyrim. Glyph is an immortal warrior cursed by the Spriggans to live eternal on one of their island paradises. glyph wishes for the help of the Dragonborn to break him free of his eternal connection to nature, in return glyph will reveal the knowledge of how he forged an immortal pact with the Spr
descriptionHtml:
Glyph is an immortal warrior cursed by the Spriggans to live eternal on one of their island paradises. glyph wishes for the help of the Dragonborn to break him free of his eternal connection to nature, in return glyph will reveal the knowledge of how he forged an immortal pact with the Spriggans.

Released early so that I may get some suggestions and feedback

/ATTENTION\\
So far 30% of the landmass has been sculpted, mobs have been placed and a boat leading to and from the island has been added. (The boat is down from windhelm port, you cant miss it, its massive.) dont download this thinking its complete, its no where near finished, the quests have not been implemented yet. but please feel free to download if you have the time and have a look at the layout and give a few suggestions!

/what im working on next\\
- Adding new islands
- adding Dungeons
- Implementing several more npcs.
- Implementing the quests.
- A new active effect \"Nature Bond\" to be awarded on completion of quest-line- you get this NOW from a spell book located on a barrel on the island.
author: FriskyAuthor
